angles.title: SB60: Red Zone Regression? Quantifying the 49ers' Scoring Dip
angles.description: Analyze the 49ers' red zone conversion rate in the playoffs compared to the regular season. Identify potential regression factors (opponent defense, play-calling changes). Project impact on SB60 scoring.
stats_to_research: 49ers' red zone conversion rate (regular season vs. playoffs)
Opponent red zone defensive rankings (playoff opponents)
Play-calling splits inside the 20 (run vs. pass)
Historical red zone regression trends in Super Bowls
Impact of key injuries on red zone efficiency
angles.betting_insights: If the 49ers' red zone efficiency is projected to regress significantly, consider betting the under on their team total points or prop bets on individual player touchdowns.

angles.title: SB60: The Underdog's Edge: Exploiting Market Inefficiencies
angles.description: Identify undervalued underdog teams based on advanced metrics (DVOA, EPA). Quantify the historical profitability of betting on underdogs with specific statistical profiles.
stats_to_research: Underdog win percentage and ATS record in Super Bowls
Correlation between DVOA/EPA and underdog success
Key statistical advantages for potential underdog teams
Public betting percentages on the favorite vs. the underdog
Historical data on similar point spreads
angles.betting_insights: Focus on underdogs with strong underlying metrics that are being overlooked by the market. Look for opportunities to exploit discrepancies between public perception and data-driven projections.

angles.title: SB60 Prop Bet Bonanza: Unearthing Hidden Value in Player Props
angles.description: Develop a model to project player performance based on opponent matchups, usage rates, and historical trends. Identify prop bets with a significant positive expected value (+EV).
stats_to_research: Player prop performance vs. similar opponents
Usage rate projections for key players
Historical prop bet payouts for similar statistical outcomes
Correlation between weather conditions and player performance
Impact of injuries on prop bet value
angles.betting_insights: Target prop bets on players with favorable matchups and high usage rates that are being underpriced by the market. Focus on props where your projections diverge significantly from the implied odds.
